description.value:
At 1st level, 2nd level, and every 4 levels thereafter, a monk may select a bonus feat. These feats must be taken from the following list:

@Compendium[pf1.feats.bZ1YdzkT8NtRIEJ4]{Catch Off-Guard}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.h9nHYLxXvIXBTmup]{Combat Reflexes}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.ACEQfonKVqh0fwkK]{Deflect Arrows}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.JreaiTHdyWFNj3Tb]{Dodge}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.ZmQkRk93nbHxsQSt]{Improved Grapple}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.2AfSIVge3bg8r6wr]{Scorpion Style}, and @Compendium[pf1.feats.gGfXQq0IZrxdcZDx]{Throw Anything}.

At 6th level, the following feats are added to the list:

@Compendium[pf1.feats.nhUawPP4jfED3CYV]{Gorgon's Fist}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.dn2KgHFQRbuoNRx0]{Improved Bull Rush}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.711B9WNFgpdDKKf2]{Improved Disarm}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.tocde3sKG1O3GKgd]{Improved Feint}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.gTrGPxzN054GfpkM]{Improved Trip}, and @Compendium[pf1.feats.R7L4SlGRlnThqFrP]{Mobility}.

At 10th level, the following feats are added to the list:

@Compendium[pf1.feats.TbOPtIL8Fv8obXtP]{Improved Critical}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.sOCyCmNxe2MBbEaI]{Medusa's Wrath}, @Compendium[pf1.feats.bHcqTC4Lf3aVl3VO]{Snatch Arrows}, and @Compendium[pf1.feats.ugQyUpqPBDsqLyra]{Spring Attack}.

A monk need not have any of the prerequisites normally required for these feats to select them.
